{"id":464095676,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1615005217,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"968 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/464095676/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"247.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int ans = INT_MIN;\n        int left = 0;\n        std::map<char, int> m;\n        bool all_uniques = true;\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++)\n        {\n            if(m.find(s[i]) == m.end())\n            {\n                m[s[i]] = i;\n            }else{\n                all_uniques = false;\n                ans = std::max(ans, i - left);\n                left = m[s[i]] + 1;\n                i = left - 1;\n                m.clear();\n            }\n        }\n    \n        if(all_uniques) return s.size();\n        if(m.find(s[s.size() - 1]) != m.end())\n        {\n            ans = std::max(ans, int(s.size()) - left);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
